mapper.select: SELECT access. node_id as id, node. name as route, node.title as name, gp.id as parent_id, gp.name as groupRoute, gp.title as groupName FROM t_access access, t_node node, t_group gp WHERE access.role_id = #{roleId} AND node.status = 1 AND access.level = 2 AND access.node_id = node.id AND gp.id = node.group_id;
SELECT node.name FROM t_access access, t_node node WHERE access.role_id = #{roleId} AND access.node_id = node.id AND access.`level` = 2;

SELECT t.*, n. NAME AS pName FROM ( SELECT access.node_id AS nodeId, node. NAME as name, access.pid, access.`level` FROM t_access access, t_node node WHERE access.role_id = #{roleId} AND access.`level` = 3 AND access.node_id = node.id ORDER BY node.`level` DESC ) t, t_node n WHERE t.pid = n.id;
